exploratory.name: Exploratory Testing
exploratory.description: A testing approach that emphasizes the tester's freedom and creativity to explore the application
steps: Plan the testing session (time, areas to test)

accessibility.name: Accessibility Testing
accessibility.description: Testing to ensure the application is usable by people with disabilities
steps: Review WCAG guidelines relevant to the application
Check color contrast and text size
Verify form labels and ARIA attributes

responsive.name: Responsive Design Testing
responsive.description: Testing to ensure the application works well on different screen sizes and devices
steps: Identify target devices and screen sizes
Test layout and content visibility on each screen size
Test user interactions on touch devices
Check loading performance on different networks

security.name: Security Testing
security.description: Testing to identify vulnerabilities in the application
steps: Identify security requirements and threat models
Check for common vulnerabilities (XSS, CSRF, SQL injection)

performance.name: Performance Testing
performance.description: Testing to evaluate the system's responsiveness and stability under various conditions
